VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.description: Revia psycasts are focused on fighing, especially against flesh-based enemies.
VanillaPsycastsExpanded.PsycasterPathDef.tooltip: Revia psycasts are focused on fighing, especially against flesh-based enemies. Skarne gives power Her scions.
